what we do
    Bingo
    (Adults Only)
    Get active with the community elders through a game of Bingo! Boxes, Crazy 8's, Shotgun and Speed Bingo! Provided by GWCC
    Clay
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Join the podcast team to tell stories about the community center and the greater city of Baltimore and its community impacts. Provided by GWCC
    Dancing
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Hip-Hop, Modern, Ballet   Baltimore Club Dance starting early 2018. Provided by Name Here
    Digital Lab
    (All Ages)
    Our computer lab is open to the public during select hours. Provided by GWCC
    Drumming
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    African Drum Lessons every Wednesday. Provided by Urban Foli Djembe Orchestra Performing Arts
    GW Podcast
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Join the podcast team to tell stories about the community center and the greater city of Baltimore and its community impacts. Provided by GWCC
    Music
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Join the podcast team to tell stories about the community center and the greater city of Baltimore and its community impacts. Provided by GWCC
    Noisy Ventures
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Learn about financial literacy + education, and create + operate micro-businesses. Provided by Noisy Tenants
    Photography
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Learn about photography and film as a medium for communal storytelling. Provided by SVNCRWNS
    Robotics
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Learn concepts about S.T.E.A.M through planning and building robots using LEGO® bricks. Provided by Muhammed's company
    Running Club
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Join the podcast team to tell stories about the community center and the greater city of Baltimore and its community impacts. Provided by GWCC
    Team Autobar
    (Youth Ages 8 - 13)
    Join the podcast team to tell stories about the community center and the greater city of Baltimore and its community impacts. Provided by GWCC
